mapper.select: SELECT ta.trainer_application_id trainerApplicationId, m.member_name memberName, et.employment_type employmentType, ta.apply_date applyDate, ta.last_update lastUpdate FROM trainer_application ta JOIN resume r ON r.resume_id = ta.resume_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = r.member_id JOIN job_opening jo ON jo.job_opening_id = ta.job_opening_id JOIN employment_type et ON et.employment_type_id = jo.employment_type_id WHERE permission_id = #{permissionId}

SELECT ta.trainer_application_id trainerApplicationId, m.member_name memberName, m.member_mail memberEmail, m.member_address memberAddress, m.member_phone memberPhone, r.career career, r.type type, r.resume_img resumeImg, r.certificate certificate, r.resume_content resumeContent, et.employment_type employmentType, jo.job_opening_title jobOpeningTitle, ta.apply_date applyDate, ta.last_update lastUpdate FROM trainer_application ta JOIN resume r ON r.resume_id = ta.resume_id JOIN member m ON m.member_id = r.member_id JOIN job_opening jo ON jo.job_opening_id = ta.job_opening_id JOIN employment_type et ON et.employment_type_id = jo.employment_type_id WHERE trainer_application_id = #{trainerApplicationId}
